text: Gu vugim, Zudaiŋ na garim, gu Fhe Bakɨme phena bɨna vhen, gu Zuda guma the phorga nzuav, ana dav, ana vhegi fhuvara. Mbe vhɨra na garim, gu gumgi gu mbigi thari, gu Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararagi phena vhen phok the khavgi fhu. Gu vhɨra kha ŋgu bakɨme vhen gumgi gu mbigi thari fugap, phok the khavgi fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara!
